priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Microbiology Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C120527

self.title: CDISC SDTM Microbiology Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the microbiology test codes of the CDISC Study Data Tabulation Model.
name: Microbiology Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Microbiology Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: A measurement of the Adenovirus antigen in a biological specimen.
A measurement of any rod-shaped bacteria that resist decolorizing by acid after accepting an aqueous stain solution, due to the mycolic acids in their cell walls.
A measurement of the Human Parvovirus B19 in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the bacterial enzyme beta-lactamase in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Burkholderia cepacia in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the bacterial sialidase enzyme in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the beta-lactamase negative bacteria in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the beta-lactamase positive bacteria in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Bordetella pertussis antigen in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the organisms that are not assigned to the species level but are assigned to the Burkholderia genus level in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the 027/NAP1/BI strain of Clostridium difficile in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Candida albicans in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Clostridium difficile in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Clostridium difficile A and/or B toxin in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Clostridium difficile A and/or B Toxin Measurement

A measurement of the fungi in a biological specimen.

A measurement of the gram negative bacteria in a biological specimen.

A measurement of the gram positive bacteria in a biological specimen.
